subject: Fines (Penalties)
Holocaust and the Nazi Era
Hockey, Ice
Anti-Semitism
lead_paragraph: The Kontinental Hockey League fined Dinamo Riga 1 million rubles ($30,000) after the Nazi symbol was displayed during a ceremony on the ice before a match this month.
snippet: The Kontinental Hockey League fined Dinamo Riga 1 million rubles ($30,000) after the Nazi symbol was displayed during a ceremony on the ice before a match this month.
